title: Tustin Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic - Chiropractor in Tustin, CA US :: Herbs/Nutrition
description: Tustin Chiropractic & Acupuncture Clinic - Chiropractic Care in Tustin, CA
cleaned_text: of herbs is guided by the Traditional Oriental Medicine diagnostic process that goes to great length to recognize the subtle differences between individuals, as well as how their health conditions change with age, season, and time of the day. Herbs are prescribed in the form of formulas which often contain 8 to 12 herbs. These formulas are composed in such ways as to match the individual's particular condition, to enhance the potency of single herbs, and reduce side-effects. Herbs are usually available as raw herbs, powder, or pills. Combinations of Acupuncture and Herb formulas relieve variety of diseases and conditions such as: - Nausea and vomiting - Degenerative Joint Disease - Headaches - Lower back pain - Flu/Cold - Digestive Problem - Menstrual cramps - Migraines - Etc.
